isis.stitle: CAB: 2000, 4000, AND 8000 - DESCRIPTION - WINDSHIELD WIPERS (ELECTRIC MOTOR)

svcproc.title: WINDSHIELD WIPERS (ELECTRIC MOTOR)
svcproc.para: The windshield wiper system consists of a single unitized 12 volt electric motor that operates the wiper arms through linkage. The motor has two speeds (low and high), and a park position which is controlled by a three-position switch.
Since the wiper motor is of unitized construction, there is no need for motor rebuild or adjustments. There are no serviceable parts; the complete assembly is replaced.
